title: I think we should nerf Repertoir
body:
I mean, the dude is fucking broken.

Post in every thread and answer everything on the Boards.

Pays attention to every idea made by the community.

Adjusts his reworks based on community feedback.

Knows how to take sarcasm and likes to joke with us.

Repertoir is seriously out-classing every other Rioter right now, he's practically permabanned. I suggest we nerf his numbers, so he's less overwhelming to the game or we bring up the Rioters to his level, so they won't feel like dumpstered when faced against an enemy Repertoir.

> [{quoted}](name=Tomb of Insomnia,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A55xNotP,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-08-16T08:23:50.645+0000)

> he generally pops his head into a thread, asks a question along the lines of "hey guys how do you feel about this" then never goes back to that thread again

This is why he has time to respond to so many threads. It's a good thing. It's the way you get feedback:

1. Ask questions
2. Read answers
3. Acknowledge that you heard the answers
4. Make changes based on those answers

He often goes back and edits his single post on the thread with feedback he's read in the thread, satisfying 1, 2, and 3. Then he acts on it -- 4. Interaction doesn't need to be huge amounts of back and forth for it to be useful.
